article.title: Status and history for [roh]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: It seems that this translation has been replaced in 2008 by a different one, at the same URL on the OHCHR site. The newer translation is at [roh_rumgr].
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
